alert.note: Alert for Claiborne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 18 at 7:59PM CST until January 18 at 8:30PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CST FOR SOUTH CENTRAL WARREN AND NORTHEASTERN CLAIBORNE COUNTIES... At 759 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Yokena, or 16 miles south of Vicksburg, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Reganton, Yokena and Rocky Springs. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for northeastern Louisiana...and central, southwestern and west central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
